info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 11:47PM CDT until March 29 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth MN
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations around a light glaze. For the Ice Storm Warning, significant icing expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations up to two inches and ice accumulations between two tenths and one half of an inch.
* WHERE...Price County.
* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM CDT Saturday. For the Ice Storm Warning, from 7 PM Saturday to 7 PM CDT Sunday.
* IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Significant ice accumulation on power lines and tree limbs may cause widespread and long-lasting power outages.
info.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Call 511 or visit www.511wi.gov for Wisconsin road information.
Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Call 511 or visit www.511wi.gov for Wisconsin road information.

parameter.value: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 7 PM CDT SUNDAY
